items.title: AgilePM® Project Management - Foundation and Practitioner

visible_instructors.name: SkillSolve
visible_instructors.title: SkillSolve Training
visible_instructors.job_title: Putting Skills into Place - Expert Accredited Learning

items.headline: Get an appreciation of Agile, Agility and  AgilePM® Project Management, a best practice for Agile project management.
objectives_summary: Describe Agile, Agility and list the various Agile approaches and an appreciation of why and when to use Agile Project Management.

Practical understanding of the underpinning philosophy, principles, lifecycle, products produced, techniques used, roles and responsibilities in an Agile project, including alternative configurations.

Help you to apply a variety of Agile practices in a project, e.g. Facilitated workshops, MoSCoW prioritisation, Iterative Development and Modelling. The Agile approach to managing and prioritising requirements.

items.title: Understanding Agile: Design Thinking, Lean Startup & SCRUM
items.headline: The newest & broadest agile course on this platform. Get certified now & master all of the top 3 agile methodologies!
objectives_summary: Develop an in-depth understanding of Agile - Why, when & how do I use it? What are the advantages over traditional project management?
Dig deep into the top 3 agile methodologies: Design Thinking, Lean Startup & SCRUM - What are the key steps & success factors?
Explore the Agile Manifesto with its 4 core values & the 12 agile principles!
